column1: Uchi////asdlf;kjasdlfkjasdlfkjasdakjs I don't even know what to say about Uchi! I just went for the second time since moving to Houston back in June
column2: and I'm just as blown away as I was after the first. I'll say that Uchi isn't exactly the traditional Japanese sushi joint in the sense of the menu
column3: as everything is a bit gussied up with fancy herbs and marinades
column4: though it's still hands-down some of the best sushi I've ever had. The fish itself is melt-in-your-mouth good and as authentic as it comes
column5: just dressed up and made into unique
column6: amazing dishes. I'm not even sure which is my favorite dish
column8: but really that's the thing...THEY ARE ALL SO GOOD! It doesn't even matter what you order!
